item.title: Lombok
item.description:
One of my favourite tools in the Java ecosystem is Lombok. It reduces the code you have to write, and increases the correctness of your code.

These days I usually include this lombok.config configuration file in the root of my projects:

config.stopBubbling = true
lombok.addLombokGeneratedAnnotation = true
lombok.fieldDefaults.defaultPrivate = true
lombok.fieldDefaults.defaultFinal = true
lombok.accessors.chain = true
lombok.accessors.fluent = true

Configuration

When I use setters, I prefer to return the instance I’m working on to be able to chain a lot of calls together. This is set as the default using lombok.accessors.chain = true.
